segment.source: Field service scenarios
segment.target: Field service scenarios

segment.source: Field service scenarios
segment.target: Field service scenarios

segment.source: Field service scenarios
segment.target: Field service scenarios

segment.source: Scenarios can help to identify security vulnerabilities in field service processes.
segment.target: Scenarios can help to identify security vulnerabilities in field service processes.

segment.source: Each scenario should be reviewed to verify that a secure solution has been implemented by the OEM.
segment.target: Each scenario should be reviewed to verify that a secure solution has been implemented by the OEM.

segment.source: Device refurbishing
segment.target: Device refurbishing

segment.source: Mobile operators and OEMs can refurbish devices by using a variety of approaches.
segment.target: Mobile operators and OEMs can refurbish devices by using a variety of approaches.

segment.source: The first refurbishment scenario occurs when customers return phones to the mobile operator for whatever reason.
segment.target: The first refurbishment scenario occurs when customers return phones to the mobile operator for whatever reason.

segment.source: In this case, the devices are typically shipped to regional OEM service centers where they are reflashed with the current OEM image.
segment.target: In this case, the devices are typically shipped to regional OEM service centers where they are reflashed with the current OEM image.

segment.source: The second refurbishment scenario occurs when customers are experiencing problems with the operation of the device.
segment.target: The second refurbishment scenario occurs when customers are experiencing problems with the operation of the device.

segment.source: The customer brings the device back to the mobile operator store, and the store associate runs basic diagnostics.
segment.target: The customer brings the device back to the mobile operator store, and the store associate runs basic diagnostics.

segment.source: The associate can attempt to reset the phone to factory settings or reflash the device OS by using flashing tools provided by Microsoft (FFU) or the OEM.
segment.target: The associate can attempt to reset the phone to factory settings or reflash the device OS by using flashing tools provided by Microsoft (FFU) or the OEM.

segment.source: If this fails, the store associate can decide to send the device to an OEM service center.
segment.target: If this fails, the store associate can decide to send the device to an OEM service center.

segment.source: Before the device leaves the control of the mobile operator and is returned to the OEM, some mechanism is used to remove all the customer data.
segment.target: Before the device leaves the control of the mobile operator and is returned to the OEM, some mechanism is used to remove all the customer data.

segment.source: The renewal of the device at the OEM service center is the third refurbishment scenario.
segment.target: The renewal of the device at the OEM service center is the third refurbishment scenario.

segment.source: The device can be reflashed using whatever tools the OEM service center is equipped with.
segment.target: The device can be reflashed using whatever tools the OEM service center is equipped with.

segment.source: Some OEMs will use OS-level flashing technology, meaning they cannot reflash the device if the modem-level boot loader or software is broken.
segment.target: Some OEMs will use OS-level flashing technology, meaning they cannot reflash the device if the modem-level boot loader or software is broken.

segment.source: Others will be able to reflash the modem and OS partitions.
segment.target: Others will be able to reflash the modem and OS partitions.

segment.source: Phone troubleshooting
segment.target: Phone troubleshooting

segment.source: Field test and diagnostics apps can be used by the mobile operator store, mobile operator service centers, and OEM service centers to perform specific tests on a phone in two different scenarios.
segment.target: Field test and diagnostics apps can be used by the mobile operator store, mobile operator service centers, and OEM service centers to perform specific tests on a phone in two different scenarios.

segment.source: The first troubleshooting scenario is when the customer is experiencing difficulties with the device and a diagnostic test is run to gather information on the reported issue.
segment.target: The first troubleshooting scenario is when the customer is experiencing difficulties with the device and a diagnostic test is run to gather information on the reported issue.

segment.source: The second scenario is when the mobile operator or OEM service centers seek to establish quality status of a device.
segment.target: The second scenario is when the mobile operator or OEM service centers seek to establish quality status of a device.

segment.source: This scenario is the more general form of the previous troubleshooting scenario.
segment.target: This scenario is the more general form of the previous troubleshooting scenario.

segment.source: This is because there could be more reasons than customer difficulties that would trigger the need for diagnostics and testing of retail phones.
segment.target: This is because there could be more reasons than customer difficulties that would trigger the need for diagnostics and testing of retail phones.

segment.source: For example, to perform field quality measures, the test could be initiated to perform random-sample testing.
segment.target: For example, to perform field quality measures, the test could be initiated to perform random-sample testing.

segment.source: Engineering flashing
segment.target: Engineering flashing

segment.source: The engineering staffs of silicon vendors and OEMs need access to flashing technologies during development of hardware and software for the phones.
segment.target: The engineering staffs of silicon vendors and OEMs need access to flashing technologies during development of hardware and software for the phones.

segment.source: This scenario is typically supported by low-level technologies such as JTAG, UEFI-based flashing, or OEM-specific flashing technologies.
segment.target: This scenario is typically supported by low-level technologies such as JTAG, UEFI-based flashing, or OEM-specific flashing technologies.

segment.source: Which technology is selected depends on issues being worked on, development processes, and the supporting tools.
segment.target: Which technology is selected depends on issues being worked on, development processes, and the supporting tools.

segment.source: The granularity of flashing options varies; lower-level tools have more flexibility in choosing which partitions can be flashed.
segment.target: The granularity of flashing options varies; lower-level tools have more flexibility in choosing which partitions can be flashed.

segment.source: Engineering diagnostics
segment.target: Engineering diagnostics

segment.source: The engineering staffs of silicon vendors and OEMs need access to diagnostics technologies during development of hardware and software for the phones.
segment.target: The engineering staffs of silicon vendors and OEMs need access to diagnostics technologies during development of hardware and software for the phones.

segment.source: These scenarios are typically supported by technologies provided by the SV or OEM that will be disabled on retail devices.
segment.target: These scenarios are typically supported by technologies provided by the SV or OEM that will be disabled on retail devices.

segment.source: Some of the SV technologies provide a broad set of capabilities—including features that support reading and writing to flash memory—that must be disabled before the device is shipped.
segment.target: Some of the SV technologies provide a broad set of capabilities—including features that support reading and writing to flash memory—that must be disabled before the device is shipped.

segment.source: Mobile operator trials
segment.target: Mobile operator trials

segment.source: There may be a need to flash OS images to the device to support mobile operator trials.
segment.target: There may be a need to flash OS images to the device to support mobile operator trials.

segment.source: Production manufacturing
segment.target: Production manufacturing

segment.source: The process of flashing phones during manufacturing varies per OEM.
segment.target: The process of flashing phones during manufacturing varies per OEM.

segment.source: Some OEMs use gang programmers that can flash a number of units at a time; others use the flashing technology described in this documentation.
segment.target: Some OEMs use gang programmers that can flash a number of units at a time; others use the flashing technology described in this documentation.

segment.source: For more info on the flashing process, see Flashing tools.
segment.target: For more info on the flashing process, see Flashing tools.

segment.source: Rework manufacturing
segment.target: Rework manufacturing

segment.source: Some OEMs have a process in place to rework phones that fail manufacturing quality control.
segment.target: Some OEMs have a process in place to rework phones that fail manufacturing quality control.

segment.source: Because the device is completely assembled, it may not be possible to use a gang programmer; this rework can be accomplished by using tethered flashing technologies similar to the customer return refurbishment scenario.
segment.target: Because the device is completely assembled, it may not be possible to use a gang programmer; this rework can be accomplished by using tethered flashing technologies similar to the customer return refurbishment scenario.

segment.source: Remanufacturing
segment.target: Remanufacturing

segment.source: There can be a need to repurpose existing phone inventory for a different region or mobile operator by replacing the existing OS with one customized for the new market.
segment.target: There can be a need to repurpose existing phone inventory for a different region or mobile operator by replacing the existing OS with one customized for the new market.

segment.target: Related topics
